/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with power lines and telephone poles, a common sight in many urban areas. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A white car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, offering a hint of nature amidst the concrete structures.
